[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]! What a nice surprise!
Are\r
you\r
having\r
fun\r
at\r
the\r
academy?\c
I hope you’re still making sure to eat plenty of
veggies now that you’re in the school dorms.\c
You know, I actually thought up some great
recipes for you! They’re for sandwiches full to\r
bursting with delicious and nutritious vegetables!
a_t01_i02_system_01: You learned how to make [VAR COLOR(0006)]Vegetable Sandwiches[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
a_t01_i02_mama_01_02:
Put these recipes to good use, OK? They’ll help
you add lots of tasty veggies to your daily meals!
a_t01_i02_mama_02_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]! What a nice surprise!
Have\r
you\r
been\r
enjoying\r
that\r

Hunt\r
of yours?\c
It makes me so happy seeing you learn and grow
in the great outdoors. So I prepared some things\r
to help you on your adventures!\c
Here! They’re sandwich recipes just for you, so
you can fit even more veggies into your meals!
